problem_summary_simple: Split digits of a number into two new numbers to minimize their sum.
problem_summary_technical: Sort the digits of the number and greedily assign them to two new numbers to minimize their sum.
key_insights: To minimize the sum of two numbers formed by a set of digits, the numbers should be as close in magnitude as possible.
Sorting the digits and then alternating their assignment to the two numbers achieves this.
Leading zeros are allowed, simplifying the construction of the two numbers.
